                             subprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: 1                                                                                                                               
                             INFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-size=2g --platform linux/amd64 --rm -i -e HELPER=True -e ARCHITECTURE=x86_64 -v                                                
                             /tasks_new/lcms_cm-full-01/fuzz-tooling/build/out/lcms:/out -v /tmp/tmpjmba1b9g:/testcase -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.3.0 reproduce                                      
                             cms_virtual_profile_fuzzer -runs=100.                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                                                                                             
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Summary                                                                                                                                                                          
                             The libFuzzer harness for `cms_virtual_profile_fuzzer` triggers an AddressSanitizer-detected stack-buffer-overflow in the Little CMS library. The overflow occurs                   
                             in the call chain ending in `UnrollChunkyBytes` (cmspack.c:130) while executing `cmsTransform2DeviceLink` in `cmsvirt.c`. A patch was attempted that replaces the                   
                             direct use of stack-allocated parameters by introducing a local input buffer (`inBuf`) of size `cmsMAXCHANNELS * sizeof(cmsUInt16Number)` and uses a `PixelSize()`                  
                             helper to determine the needed memory. After applying this change, the build fails with an undefined reference to `PixelSize` during linkage and a DWARF error in                   
                             the ELF sections from `cmsvirt.o`.                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Description                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Initial Issue                                                                                                                                                                       
                             - The fuzzer was launched in interactive mode with `libFuzzer`, running 100 iterations on a single testcase.                                                                        
                             - AddressSanitizer reports a 1-byte read overflow in `UnrollChunkyBytes` at `cmspack.c:130:13`.                                                                                     
                             - The overflow originates from a local stack buffer in `cmsTransform2DeviceLink` (`cmsvirt.c:1185`). In that functions stack frame, a 4-byte read of variable                      
                             `i.i` extends beyond its allocated [32,36) region.                                                                                                                                  
                             - The crash trace shows calls through `CachedXFORM`, `cmsDoTransform`, and ultimately the fuzzer entry point `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Patch Attempt                                                                                                                                                                       
                             - The patch modifies `cmsTransform2DeviceLink` in `src/cmsvirt.c`.                                                                                                                  
                             - It introduces a local block where:                                                                                                                                                
                                `PixelSizeIn` is computed via `PixelSize(v->InputFormat)`.                                                                                                                      
                                A fixed-size buffer `cmsUInt8Number inBuf[cmsMAXCHANNELS * sizeof(cmsUInt16Number)]` is declared.                                                                               
                                For each named color index `i`, the buffer is zeroed, `i` is copied into it, and `cmsDoTransform` is called with `inBuf` instead of `&i`.                                       
                             - The patch is intended to prevent referencing the small stack slot for `i` inside the transform.                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Patch Result                                                                                                                                                                        
                             - During the build of the `transicc` utility, the linker fails with:                                                                                                                
                                 undefined reference to `PixelSize`                                                                                                                                              
                               indicating that `PixelSize` is either not declared or not linked into the library.                                                                                                
                             - A DWARF error (`invalid or unhandled FORM value: 0x25`) is also emitted but likely ancillary.                                                                                     
                             - Consequently, the build terminates with errors in `cmsvirt.o` and fails to produce the `transicc` binary.                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Areas for Further Investigation                                                                                                                                                     
                             - The definition and visibility of the `PixelSize` function: confirm its declaration in headers, its presence in the library, and linkage against `cmsvirt.o`.                      
                             - The stack layout in `cmsTransform2DeviceLink`: identify all local arrays and structures used for input/output to determine safe buffer sizing or alternative                      
                             allocation strategies.                                                                                                                                                              
                             - The implementation of `UnrollChunkyBytes` in `cmspack.c` (around line 130): check assumptions on input size and how `PixelSize` or channel counts factor into                     
                             buffer bounds.                                                                                                                                                                      
                             - DWARF metadata generation during compilation of `cmsvirt.c`: ensure proper compiler flags and toolchain compatibility to avoid debug info errors that may mask                    
                             linking issues.                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Initial Issue Log

                             1183:// Does convert a transform into a device link profile                                                                                                                         
                             1184:cmsHPROFILE CMSEXPORT cmsTransform2DeviceLink(cmsHTRANSFORM hTransform, cmsFloat64Number Version, cmsUInt32Number dwFlags)                                                     
                             1185:{                                                                                                                                                                              
                             1186:    cmsHPROFILE hProfile = NULL;                                                                                                                                               
                             1187:    cmsUInt32Number FrmIn, FrmOut;                                                                                                                                             
                             1188:    cmsInt32Number ChansIn, ChansOut;                                                                                                                                          
                             1189:    int ColorSpaceBitsIn, ColorSpaceBitsOut;                                                                                                                                   
                             1190:    _cmsTRANSFORM* xform = (_cmsTRANSFORM*) hTransform;                                                                                                                        
                             1191:    cmsPipeline* LUT = NULL;                                                                                                                                                   
                             1192:    cmsStage* mpe;                                                                                                                                                             
                             1193:    cmsContext ContextID = cmsGetTransformContextID(hTransform);                                                                                                               
                             1194:    const cmsAllowedLUT* AllowedLUT;                                                                                                                                           
                             1195:    cmsTagSignature DestinationTag;                                                                                                                                            
                             1196:    cmsProfileClassSignature deviceClass;                                                                                                                                      
                             1197:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1198:    _cmsAssert(hTransform != NULL);                                                                                                                                            
                             1199:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1200:    // Check if the pipeline holding is valid                                                                                                                                  
                             1201:    if (xform -> Lut == NULL) return NULL;                                                                                                                                     
                             1202:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1203:    // Get the first mpe to check for named color                                                                                                                              
                             1204:    mpe = cmsPipelineGetPtrToFirstStage(xform ->Lut);                                                                                                                          
                             1205:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1206:    // Check if is a named color transform                                                                                                                                     
                             1207:    if (mpe != NULL) {                                                                                                                                                         
                             1208:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1209:        if (cmsStageType(mpe) == cmsSigNamedColorElemType) {                                                                                                                   
                             1210:            return CreateNamedColorDevicelink(hTransform);                                                                                                                     
                             1211:        }                                                                                                                                                                      
                             1212:    }                                                                                                                                                                          
                             1213:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1214:    // First thing to do is to get a copy of the transformation                                                                                                                
                             1215:    LUT = cmsPipelineDup(xform ->Lut);                                                                                                                                         
                             1216:    if (LUT == NULL) return NULL;                                                                                                                                              
                             1217:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1218:    // Time to fix the Lab2/Lab4 issue.                                                                                                                                        
                             1219:    if ((xform ->EntryColorSpace == cmsSigLabData) && (Version < 4.0)) {                                                                                                       
                             1220:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1221:        if (!cmsPipelineInsertStage(LUT, cmsAT_BEGIN, _cmsStageAllocLabV2ToV4curves(ContextID)))                                                                               
                             1222:            goto Error;                                                                                                                                                        
                             1223:    }                                                                                                                                                                          
                             1224:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1225:    // On the output side too. Note that due to V2/V4 PCS encoding on lab we cannot fix white misalignments                                                                    
                             1226:    if ((xform ->ExitColorSpace) == cmsSigLabData && (Version < 4.0)) {                                                                                                        
                             1227:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1228:        dwFlags |= cmsFLAGS_NOWHITEONWHITEFIXUP;                                                                                                                               
                             1229:        if (!cmsPipelineInsertStage(LUT, cmsAT_END, _cmsStageAllocLabV4ToV2(ContextID)))                                                                                       
                             1230:            goto Error;                                                                                                                                                        
                             1231:    }                                                                                                                                                                          
                             1232:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1233:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1234:    hProfile = cmsCreateProfilePlaceholder(ContextID);                                                                                                                         
                             1235:    if (!hProfile) goto Error;                    // can't allocate                                                                                                            
                             1236:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1237:    cmsSetProfileVersion(hProfile, Version);                                                                                                                                   
                             1238:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1239:    FixColorSpaces(hProfile, xform -> EntryColorSpace, xform -> ExitColorSpace, dwFlags);                                                                                      
                             1240:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             ```

                             src/cmsxform.c:175-186                                                                                                                                                              
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             175:static                                                                                                                                                                          
                             176:cmsUInt32Number PixelSize(cmsUInt32Number Format)                                                                                                                               
                             177:{                                                                                                                                                                               
                             178:    cmsUInt32Number fmt_bytes = T_BYTES(Format);                                                                                                                                
                             179:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             180:    // For double, the T_BYTES field is zero                                                                                                                                    
                             181:    if (fmt_bytes == 0)                                                                                                                                                         
                             182:        return sizeof(cmsUInt64Number);                                                                                                                                         
                             183:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             184:    // Otherwise, it is already correct for all formats                                                                                                                         
                             185:    return fmt_bytes;                                                                                                                                                           
                             186:}

                             671:typedef void* cmsHPROFILE;             // Opaque typedefs to hide internals                                                                                                     
                             672:typedef void* cmsHTRANSFORM;                                                                                                                                                    
                             673:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             674:#define cmsMAXCHANNELS  16                // Maximum number of channels in ICC profiles                                                                                         
                             675:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             676:// Format of pixel is defined by one cmsUInt32Number, using bit fields as follows                                                                                               
                             677://                                                                                                                                                                              
                             678://                               2                1          0                                                                                                                  
                             679://                        4 3 2 10987 6 5 4 3 2 1 098 7654 321                                                                                                                  
                             680://                        M A O TTTTT U Y F P X S EEE CCCC BBB

                             1082:{                                                                                                                                                                              
                             1083:    cmsUInt32Number fmt_bytes = T_BYTES(Format);                                                                                                                               
                             1084:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1085:    // For double, the T_BYTES field is zero                                                                                                                                   
                             1086:    if (fmt_bytes == 0)                                                                                                                                                        
                             1087:        return sizeof(cmsUInt64Number);                                                                                                                                        
                             1088:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1089:    // Otherwise, it is already correct for all formats                                                                                                                        
                             1090:    return fmt_bytes;                                                                                                                                                          
                             1091:}                                                                                                                                                                              
                             ```

                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             src/cmsvirt.c:1096-1105                                                                                                                                                             
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1096:    // Make sure we have proper formatters                                                                                                                                     
                             1097:    cmsChangeBuffersFormat(xform, TYPE_NAMED_COLOR_INDEX,                                                                                                                      
                             1098:        FLOAT_SH(0) | COLORSPACE_SH(_cmsLCMScolorSpace(v ->ExitColorSpace))                                                                                                    
                             1099:        | BYTES_SH(2) | CHANNELS_SH(cmsChannelsOfColorSpace(v ->ExitColorSpace)));                                                                                             
                             1100:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1101:    // Apply the transfor to colorants.                                                                                                                                        
                             1102:    for (i=0; i < nColors; i++) {                                                                                                                                              
                             1103:        cmsDoTransform(xform, &i, nc2 ->List[i].DeviceColorant, 1);                                                                                                            
                             1104:    }                                                                                                                                                                          
                             1105:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             </code_snippets>                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Fix Strategy                                                                                                                                                                     
                             <fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1. Expose PixelSize as a public symbol                                                                                                                                              
                                a. In src/cmsxform.c, change the PixelSize implementation from a translationunitlocal/static function to an exported one:                                                      
                                   - Remove the `static` keyword.                                                                                                                                                
                                   - Prepend `CMSEXPORT` (or the equivalent export macro) so that the linker emits a global `PixelSize` symbol.                                                                  
                                b. In the public header (include/lcms2.h), add the declaration:                                                                                                                  
                                   ```c                                                                                                                                                                          
                                   CMSEXPORT cmsUInt32Number PixelSize(cmsUInt32Number Format);                                                                                                                  
                                   ```                                                                                                                                                                           
                                   Place it alongside the other buffer/format helper prototypes.                                                                                                                 
                                c. Leave the inline definition of `PixelSize` in cmspack.c as a `static inline` so that local inlines still work, but no conflicting external symbol is                          
                             produced.                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             2. Rewrite the namedcolor loop in cmsvirt.c to use a properly sized input buffer                                                                                                   
                                In the function cmsTransform2DeviceLink (or CreateNamedColorDevicelink), replace the existing                                                                                    
                                ```c                                                                                                                                                                             
                                for (i = 0; i < nColors; i++) {                                                                                                                                                  
                                    cmsDoTransform(xform, &i, nc2->List[i].DeviceColorant, 1);                                                                                                                   
                                }                                                                                                                                                                                
                                ```                                                                                                                                                                              
                                with something like:                                                                                                                                                             
                                ```c                                                                                                                                                                             
                                {                                                                                                                                                                                
                                    // Determine exactly how many bytes one pixel requires for this transform                                                                                                  
                                    cmsUInt32Number inSize = PixelSize(xform->InputFormat);                                                                                                                      
                                    cmsUInt8Number  inBuf[inSize];        // stack buffer sized to PixelSize                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                    for (i = 0; i < nColors; i++) {                                                                                                                                              
                                        memset(inBuf, 0, inSize);         // zero all channels                                                                                                                   
                                        memcpy(inBuf, &i, sizeof(cmsUInt32Number));                                                                                                                              
                                                                         // encode the namedcolor index                                                                                                         
                                        cmsDoTransform(xform, inBuf,                                                                                                                                             
                                                       nc2->List[i].DeviceColorant,                                                                                                                              
                                                       1);                                                                                                                                                       
                                    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                                }                                                                                                                                                                                
                                ```                                                                                                                                                                              
                                Key points:                                                                                                                                                                      
                                - Use `xform->InputFormat` (the same format that cmsDoTransform will expect) to compute the buffer length.                                                                       
                                - Zero the entire buffer so that any unused channels are safe.                                                                                                                   
                                - Copy the 32bit index into the first bytes of the buffer.                                                                                                                      
                                - Pass the buffer (not `&i`) to `cmsDoTransform`.                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             3. Rebuild and verify                                                                                                                                                               
                                - Clean and rebuild the core library so that `liblcms2.a` now contains a global `PixelSize` symbol.                                                                              
                                - Rebuild the `transicc` utility; it should now link successfully against `PixelSize`, and the AddressSanitizer stack overflow in `UnrollChunkyBytes` will be                    
                             eliminated because each call to `cmsDoTransform` receives a fullsized input buffer.                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Justification and sideeffect analysis                                                                                                                                              
                             - Exposing `PixelSize` fixes the undefinedreference linker error without touching external libraries or harness code.                                                              
                             - Allocating a buffer of exactly `PixelSize(InputFormat)` bytes addresses the stackbufferoverflow root cause by satisfying the callers contract to provide `Size                 
                             * PixelSize(format)` bytes.                                                                                                                                                         
                             - Existing code paths in cmspack.c still use an inline `PixelSize` for efficiency; no global symbol conflict will occur because that inline is `static`.                            
                             - All existing functionality and fuzz harness logic remain untouched; no broad exception catches or test modifications are introduced.                                              
                             - This minimal approach preserves library invariants, retains performance characteristics, and eliminates both the overflow and linkage failures.                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                     
                             ===Evaluation End===

                             /tasks_new/lcms_cm-full-01/fuzz-tooling/build/out/lcms:/out -v /tmp/tmpjmba1b9g:/testcase -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.3.0 reproduce                                      
                             cms_virtual_profile_fuzzer -runs=100.                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                                                                                             
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Summary                                                                                                                                                                          
                             The initial issue is a stack-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer during a fuzzing run of `cms_virtual_profile_fuzzer`. The overflow occurs in the function                 
                             `UnrollChunkyBytes` (`cmspack.c:130:13`), triggered by a call chain leading through `cmsTransform2DeviceLink` in `cmsvirt.c`. A patch was attempted to (1) expose                   
                             and reuse a helper function `PixelSize` across modules and (2) replace the direct integerindex pass to `cmsDoTransform` with a dynamicallysized input buffer on                   
                             the stack, zeroinitialized and then populated with the loop index. After applying the patch, the build fails with a compiler error indicating a conflicting                        
                             declaration of `PixelSize`: the newly exported non-static declaration in `cmsxform.c` and its header conflicts with the existing `static` inline version in                         
                             `cmspack.c`.                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Description                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Initial issue:                                                                                                                                                                      
                             - When running the fuzzer with libFuzzer, AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte stack-buffer-overflow:                                                                                
                                Crash location: `UnrollChunkyBytes` in `cmspack.c:130:13`.                                                                                                                      
                                Triggered by `cmsDoTransform`  `CreateNamedColorDevicelink`  `cmsTransform2DeviceLink`  `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.                                                            
                                Error details:                                                                                                                                                                  
                                  Read of size 1 at a stack address just past the bounds of a local array (offset 36 in frame).                                                                                 
                                  The overflow occurs on a stackallocated object `'i.i'` in `cmsTransform2DeviceLink` at line 1071.                                                                            
                                ASan report shows redzone bytes and points out stackframe objects in `cmsTransform2DeviceLink`, indicating that the input buffer passed to `cmsDoTransform`                    
                             was too small or miscomputed.                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Patch attempt:                                                                                                                                                                      
                             1. In `src/cmsxform.c`, changed the definition of `PixelSize` from `static` to `CMSEXPORT` (removing `static` and adding visibility attribute).                                     
                             2. In `include/lcms2.h`, added the prototype:                                                                                                                                       
                                  CMSEXPORT cmsUInt32Number PixelSize(cmsUInt32Number Format);                                                                                                                   
                             3. In `src/cmsvirt.c`, around line 1098:                                                                                                                                            
                                - Wrapped the loop over `nColors` in a block, computed `inSize = PixelSize(xform->InputFormat)`.                                                                                 
                                - Declared a VLArray `cmsUInt8Number inBuf[inSize];`.                                                                                                                            
                                - In each iteration, zeroed `inBuf`, copied the loop index `i` into it, then called `cmsDoTransform(xform, inBuf, nc2->List[i].DeviceColorant, 1);`                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Patch result:                                                                                                                                                                       
                             - Compilation fails in `cmspack.c` with:                                                                                                                                            
                                  cmspack.c:1081:27: error: static declaration of 'PixelSize' follows non-static declaration                                                                                     
                             - The headers nonstatic `PixelSize` conflicts with the existing `static inline cmsUInt32Number PixelSize` in `cmspack.c`.                                                         
                             - Build aborts with status 2; fuzzers not compiled.                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Areas for further investigation:                                                                                                                                                    
                             - The multiple definitions of `PixelSize`:                                                                                                                                          
                                The `static inline` version in `cmspack.c`.                                                                                                                                     
                                The newly exported version in `cmsxform.c`/header.                                                                                                                              
                             - The call site in `cmsTransform2DeviceLink` where an integer index was directly passed as input to `cmsDoTransform`. How the input buffer is sized and populated.                  
                             - The implementation of `UnrollChunkyBytes` in `cmspack.c` at line 130, which overreads based on pixel format or channel count.                                                     
                             - The relationship between `xform->InputFormat`, computed pixel size, and the stack allocation in `cmsvirt.c`.                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                                                                                                
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:

                               0x7f12e5960c80: f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5                                                                                                                   
                             =>0x7f12e5960d00: f1 f1 f1 f1[04]f2 04 f2 04 f2 04 f2 00 f3 f3 f3                                                                                                                   
                               0x7f12e5960d80: f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5

                               0x7f12e5960e80: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00                                                                                                                   
                               0x7f12e5960f00: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00                                                                                                                   
                               0x7f12e5960f80: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00                                                                                                                   
                             Shadow byte legend (one shadow byte represents 8 application bytes):                                                                                                                
                               Addressable:           00                                                                                                                                                         
                               Partially addressable: 01 02 03 04 05 06 07                                                                                                                                       
                               Heap left redzone:       fa                                                                                                                                                       
                               Freed heap region:       fd                                                                                                                                                       
                               Stack left redzone:      f1                                                                                                                                                       
                               Stack mid redzone:       f2                                                                                                                                                       
                               Stack right redzone:     f3                                                                                                                                                       
                               Stack after return:      f5                                                                                                                                                       
                               Stack use after scope:   f8                                                                                                                                                       
                               Global redzone:          f9                                                                                                                                                       
                               Global init order:       f6                                                                                                                                                       
                               Poisoned by user:        f7                                                                                                                                                       
                               Container overflow:      fc                                                                                                                                                       
                               Array cookie:            ac                                                                                                                                                       
                               Intra object redzone:    bb                                                                                                                                                       
                               ASan internal:           fe                                                                                                                                                       
                               Left alloca redzone:     ca                                                                                                                                                       
                               Right alloca redzone:    cb                                                                                                                                                       
                             ==18==ABORTING

                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             src/cmspack.c:1-200                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1://---------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                               
                             2://                                                                                                                                                                                
                             3://  Little Color Management System

                             12://

                             14:// all copies or substantial portions of the Software.                                                                                                                           
                             15://
