                             22:// WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.                                                                                                               
                             23://                                                                                                                                                                               
                             24://---------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                              
                             25://                                                                                                                                                                               
                             26:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             27:#ifndef _lcms_internal_H                                                                                                                                                         
                             28:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             29:// Include plug-in foundation                                                                                                                                                    
                             30:#ifndef _lcms_plugin_H                                                                                                                                                           
                             31:#   include "lcms2_plugin.h"                                                                                                                                                     
                             32:#endif                                                                                                                                                                           
                             33:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             34:// ctype is part of C99 as per 7.1.2                                                                                                                                             
                             35:#include <ctype.h>                                                                                                                                                               
                             36:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             37:// assert macro is part of C99 as per 7.2                                                                                                                                        
                             38:#include <assert.h>                                                                                                                                                              
                             39:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             40:// Some needed constants                                                                                                                                                         
                             41:#ifndef M_PI                                                                                                                                                                     
                             42:#       define M_PI        3.14159265358979323846                                                                                                                                
                             43:#endif                                                                                                                                                                           
                             44:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             45:#ifndef M_LOG10E                                                                                                                                                                 
                             46:#       define M_LOG10E    0.434294481903251827651                                                                                                                               
                             47:#endif                                                                                                                                                                           
                             48:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             49:// BorlandC 5.5, VC2003 are broken on that                                                                                                                                       
                             50:#if defined(__BORLANDC__) || (defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER < 1400)) // 1400 == VC++ 8.0                                                                                        
                             51:#define sinf(x) (float)sin((float)x)                                                                                                                                             
                             52:#define sqrtf(x) (float)sqrt((float)x)                                                                                                                                           
                             53:#endif                                                                                                                                                                           
                             54:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             55:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             56:// Alignment of ICC file format uses 4 bytes (cmsUInt32Number)                                                                                                                   
                             57:#define _cmsALIGNLONG(x) (((x)+(sizeof(cmsUInt32Number)-1)) & ~(sizeof(cmsUInt32Number)-1))                                                                                      
                             58:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             59:// Alignment to memory pointer                                                                                                                                                   
                             60:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             61:// (Ultra)SPARC with gcc requires ptr alignment of 8 bytes                                                                                                                       
                             62:// even though sizeof(void *) is only four: for greatest flexibility                                                                                                             
                             63:// allow the build to specify ptr alignment.                                                                                                                                     
                             64:#ifndef CMS_PTR_ALIGNMENT                                                                                                                                                        
                             65:# define CMS_PTR_ALIGNMENT sizeof(void *)                                                                                                                                        
                             66:#endif                                                                                                                                                                           
                             67:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             68:#define _cmsALIGNMEM(x)  (((x)+(CMS_PTR_ALIGNMENT - 1)) & ~(CMS_PTR_ALIGNMENT - 1))                                                                                              
                             69:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             70:// Maximum encodeable values in floating point                                                                                                                                   
                             71:#define MAX_ENCODEABLE_XYZ  (1.0 + 32767.0/32768.0)                                                                                                                              
                             72:#define MIN_ENCODEABLE_ab2  (-128.0)                                                                                                                                             
                             73:#define MAX_ENCODEABLE_ab2  ((65535.0/256.0) - 128.0)                                                                                                                            
                             74:#define MIN_ENCODEABLE_ab4  (-128.0)                                                                                                                                             
                             75:#define MAX_ENCODEABLE_ab4  (127.0)                                                                                                                                              
                             76:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             77:// Maximum of channels for internal pipeline evaluation                                                                                                                          
                             78:#define MAX_STAGE_CHANNELS  128                                                                                                                                                  
                             79:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             80:// Unused parameter warning suppression                                                                                                                                          
                             81:#define cmsUNUSED_PARAMETER(x) ((void)x)                                                                                                                                         
                             82:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             83:// The specification for "inline" is section 6.7.4 of the C99 standard (ISO/IEC 9899:1999).                                                                                      
                             84:// unfortunately VisualC++ does not conform that                                                                                                                                 
                             85:#if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__BORLANDC__)                                                                                                                                   
                             86:#   define cmsINLINE __inline                                                                                                                                                    
                             87:#else                                                                                                                                                                            
                             88:#   define cmsINLINE static inline                                                                                                                                               
                             89:#endif                                                                                                                                                                           
                             90:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             91:// Allow signed overflow, we know this is harmless in this particular context                                                                                                    
                             92:#if defined(__clang__)                                                                                                                                                           
                             93:#   define CMS_NO_SANITIZE __attribute__((no_sanitize("signed-integer-overflow")))                                                                                               
                             94:#else                                                                                                                                                                            
                             95:#   define CMS_NO_SANITIZE                                                                                                                                                       
                             96:#endif                                                                                                                                                                           
                             97:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             98:// Other replacement functions                                                                                                                                                   
                             99:#ifdef _MSC_VER                                                                                                                                                                  
                             100:# ifndef snprintf                                                                                                                                                               
                             101:#       define snprintf  _snprintf                                                                                                                                              
                             102:# endif                                                                                                                                                                         
                             103:# ifndef vsnprintf                                                                                                                                                              
                             104:#       define vsnprintf  _vsnprintf                                                                                                                                            
                             105:# endif                                                                                                                                                                         
                             106:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             107:/// Properly define some macros to accommodate                                                                                                                                  
                             108:/// older MSVC versions.                                                                                                                                                        
                             109:# if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER <= 1700                                                                                                                                      
                             110:        #include <float.h>                                                                                                                                                      
                             111:        #define isnan _isnan                                                                                                                                                    
                             112:        #define isinf(x) (!_finite((x)))                                                                                                                                        
                             113:# endif                                                                                                                                                                         
                             114:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             115:#if !defined(_MSC_VER) && (defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && __STDC_VERSION__ < 199901L)                                                                                             
                             116:        #if !defined(isinf)                                                                                                                                                     
                             117:        #define isinf(x) (!finite((x)))                                                                                                                                         
                             118:        #endif                                                                                                                                                                  
                             119:#endif                                                                                                                                                                          
                             120:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             121:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             122:#endif                                                                                                                                                                          
                             123:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             124:// A fast way to convert from/to 16 <-> 8 bits                                                                                                                                  
                             125:#define FROM_8_TO_16(rgb) (cmsUInt16Number) ((((cmsUInt16Number) (rgb)) << 8)|(rgb))                                                                                            
                             126:#define FROM_16_TO_8(rgb) (cmsUInt8Number) ((((cmsUInt32Number)(rgb) * 65281U + 8388608U) >> 24) & 0xFFU)                                                                       
                             127:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             128:// Code analysis is broken on asserts                                                                                                                                           
                             129:#ifdef _MSC_VER                                                                                                                                                                 
                             130:#    if (_MSC_VER >= 1500)                                                                                                                                                      
                             131:#            define _cmsAssert(a)  { assert((a)); __analysis_assume((a)); }                                                                                                     
                             132:#     else                                                                                                                                                                      
                             133:#            define _cmsAssert(a)   assert((a))                                                                                                                                 
                             134:#     endif                                                                                                                                                                     
                             135:#else                                                                                                                                                                           
                             136:#      define _cmsAssert(a)   assert((a))                                                                                                                                       
                             137:#endif                                                                                                                                                                          
                             138:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             139://---------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                             
                             140:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             141:// Determinant lower than that are assumed zero (used on matrix invert)                                                                                                         
                             142:#define MATRIX_DET_TOLERANCE    0.0001                                                                                                                                          
                             143:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             144://---------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                             
                             145:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             146:// Fixed point                                                                                                                                                                  
                             147:#define FIXED_TO_INT(x)         ((x)>>16)                                                                                                                                       
                             148:#define FIXED_REST_TO_INT(x)    ((x)&0xFFFFU)                                                                                                                                   
                             149:#define ROUND_FIXED_TO_INT(x)   (((x)+0x8000)>>16)                                                                                                                              
                             150:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             151:cmsINLINE cmsS15Fixed16Number _cmsToFixedDomain(int a)                   { return a + ((a + 0x7fff) / 0xffff); }                                                                
                             152:cmsINLINE int                 _cmsFromFixedDomain(cmsS15Fixed16Number a) { return a - ((a + 0x7fff) >> 16); }                                                                   
                             153:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             154:// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                  
                             155:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             156:// Fast floor conversion logic. Thanks to Sree Kotay and Stuart Nixon                                                                                                           
                             157:// note than this only works in the range ..-32767...+32767 because                                                                                                             
                             158:// mantissa is interpreted as 15.16 fixed point.                                                                                                                                
                             159:// The union is to avoid pointer aliasing overoptimization.                                                                                                                     
                             160:cmsINLINE int _cmsQuickFloor(cmsFloat64Number val)                                                                                                                              
                             161:{                                                                                                                                                                               
                             162:#ifdef CMS_DONT_USE_FAST_FLOOR                                                                                                                                                  
                             163:    return (int) floor(val);                                                                                                                                                    
                             164:#else                                                                                                                                                                           
                             165:    const cmsFloat64Number _lcms_double2fixmagic = 68719476736.0 * 1.5;  // 2^36 * 1.5, (52-16=36) uses limited precision to floor                                              
                             166:    union {                                                                                                                                                                     
                             167:        cmsFloat64Number val;                                                                                                                                                   
                             168:        int halves[2];                                                                                                                                                          
                             169:    } temp;                                                                                                                                                                     
                             170:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             171:    temp.val = val + _lcms_double2fixmagic;                                                                                                                                     
                             172:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             173:#ifdef CMS_USE_BIG_ENDIAN                                                                                                                                                       
                             174:    return temp.halves[1] >> 16;                                                                                                                                                
                             175:#else                                                                                                                                                                           
                             176:    return temp.halves[0] >> 16;                                                                                                                                                
                             177:#endif                                                                                                                                                                          
                             178:#endif                                                                                                                                                                          
                             179:}                                                                                                                                                                               
                             180:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             181:// Fast floor restricted to 0..65535.0                                                                                                                                          
                             182:cmsINLINE cmsUInt16Number _cmsQuickFloorWord(cmsFloat64Number d)                                                                                                                
                             183:{                                                                                                                                                                               
                             184:    return (cmsUInt16Number) _cmsQuickFloor(d - 32767.0) + 32767U;                                                                                                              
                             185:}                                                                                                                                                                               
                             186:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             187:// Floor to word, taking care of saturation                                                                                                                                     
                             188:cmsINLINE cmsUInt16Number _cmsQuickSaturateWord(cmsFloat64Number d)                                                                                                             
                             189:{                                                                                                                                                                               
                             190:    d += 0.5;                                                                                                                                                                   
                             191:    if (d <= 0) return 0;                                                                                                                                                       
                             192:    if (d >= 65535.0) return 0xffff;                                                                                                                                            
                             193:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             194:    return _cmsQuickFloorWord(d);                                                                                                                                               
                             195:}                                                                                                                                                                               
                             196:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             197:// Test bed entry points---------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                         
                             198:#define CMSCHECKPOINT CMSAPI                                                                                                                                                    
                             199:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             200:// Pthread support --------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                         
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             src/cmspack.c:1081-1091                                                                                                                                                             
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1081:cmsINLINE cmsUInt32Number PixelSize(cmsUInt32Number Format)                                                                                                                    
                             1082:{                                                                                                                                                                              
                             1083:    cmsUInt32Number fmt_bytes = T_BYTES(Format);                                                                                                                               
                             1084:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1085:    // For double, the T_BYTES field is zero                                                                                                                                   
                             1086:    if (fmt_bytes == 0)                                                                                                                                                        
                             1087:        return sizeof(cmsUInt64Number);                                                                                                                                        
                             1088:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1089:    // Otherwise, it is already correct for all formats                                                                                                                        
                             1090:    return fmt_bytes;                                                                                                                                                          
                             1091:}                                                                                                                                                                              
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             src/cmsvirt.c:1096-1105                                                                                                                                                             
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1096:    // Make sure we have proper formatters                                                                                                                                     
                             1097:    cmsChangeBuffersFormat(xform, TYPE_NAMED_COLOR_INDEX,                                                                                                                      
                             1098:        FLOAT_SH(0) | COLORSPACE_SH(_cmsLCMScolorSpace(v ->ExitColorSpace))                                                                                                    
                             1099:        | BYTES_SH(2) | CHANNELS_SH(cmsChannelsOfColorSpace(v ->ExitColorSpace)));                                                                                             
                             1100:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1101:    // Apply the transfor to colorants.                                                                                                                                        
                             1102:    for (i=0; i < nColors; i++) {                                                                                                                                              
                             1103:        cmsDoTransform(xform, &i, nc2 ->List[i].DeviceColorant, 1);                                                                                                            
                             1104:    }                                                                                                                                                                          
                             1105:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             </code_snippets>                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Fix Strategy                                                                                                                                                                     
                             <fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1. Consolidate the PixelSize helper into a single inline definition                                                                                                                 
                                a. Remove both existing PixelSize implementations from src/cmspack.c (lines 10811091) and src/cmsxform.c (the CMSEXPORT version).                                               
                                b. Remove the CMSEXPORT declaration from include/lcms2.h.                                                                                                                        
                                c. Add a `cmsINLINE` static inline PixelSize function to lcms2_internal.h (or another internal-only header), e.g.:                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                   ```                                                                                                                                                                           
                                   cmsINLINE cmsUInt32Number PixelSize(cmsUInt32Number Format)                                                                                                                   
                                   {                                                                                                                                                                             
                                       cmsUInt32Number fmt_bytes = T_BYTES(Format);                                                                                                                              
                                       if (fmt_bytes == 0)                  // doubleprecision channels                                                                                                         
                                           return sizeof(cmsUInt64Number);                                                                                                                                       
                                       return fmt_bytes;                    // normal formats                                                                                                                    
                                   }                                                                                                                                                                             
                                   ```                                                                                                                                                                           
                                d. This ensures all modules (cmspack.c, cmsxform.c, cmsvirt.c) see the same inline definition without symbol collisions and without exposing a new public API.                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             2. Reapply and refine the cmsTransform2DeviceLink patch to avoid stackbufferoverflow:                                                                                             
                                a. In src/cmsvirt.c, around the namedcolor loop, replace the old `cmsDoTransform(xform, &i, ...)` call with:                                                                    
                                   ```                                                                                                                                                                           
                                   {                                                                                                                                                                             
                                       // Compute required input buffer size per pixel                                                                                                                           
                                       cmsUInt32Number inSize = PixelSize(xform->InputFormat);                                                                                                                   
                                       cmsUInt8Number inBuf[inSize];                // VLA, zeroinitialized                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                       for (i = 0; i < nColors; i++) {                                                                                                                                           
                                           // Zero the input buffer                                                                                                                                              
                                           memset(inBuf, 0, inSize);                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                           // Pack the namedcolor index into the first bytes (littleendian)                                                                                                    
                                           // Only sizeof(i) bytes are meaningful; the rest remain zero                                                                                                          
                                           memcpy(inBuf, &i, sizeof(i));                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                           // Invoke transform with a buffer of correct length                                                                                                                   
                                           cmsDoTransform(xform, inBuf,                                                                                                                                          
                                                          nc2->List[i].DeviceColorant,                                                                                                                           
                                                          1);                                                                                                                                                    
                                       }                                                                                                                                                                         
                                   }                                                                                                                                                                             
                                   ```                                                                                                                                                                           
                                b. This guarantees UnrollChunkyBytes sees at least `nChan * T_BYTES(...)` bytes and cannot overread.                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             3. Verify include dependencies                                                                                                                                                      
                                a. Ensure src/cmsvirt.c, src/cmspack.c, and src/cmsxform.c include lcms2_internal.h so they inherit the inline PixelSize.                                                        
                                b. Remove any dangling PixelSize declarations in public headers to keep the public API unchanged.                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             4. Preserve existing functionality and tests                                                                                                                                        
                                - The inline PixelSize replicates the previous logic used in both modules.                                                                                                       
                                - The new buffer logic in cmsvirt.c only affects the namedcolor devicelink path, guarded by the same loop bounds; all other code paths remain untouched.                        
                                - No external libraries, harness, or test code is modified.                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             5. Sideeffect mitigation                                                                                                                                                           
                                - Using a VLA for inBuf is consistent with C99 and existing code style (other VLAs may already exist).                                                                           
                                - The small inline overhead for PixelSize is negligible.                                                                                                                         
                                - Littleendian memcpy of the integer index matches original behavior of passing `&i` on littleendian platforms; if bigendian support is required, add an                      
                             endianaware pack (e.g., use shifts).                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Justification                                                                                                                                                                       
                             - By centralizing PixelSize as a static inline in an internal header, we avoid symbol conflicts and maintain compiletime optimization.                                             
                             - The new inputbuffer allocation directly addresses the onebyte stackoverflow in UnrollChunkyBytes by providing a correctly sized, zeroinitialized buffer.                      
                             - All existing logic in cmspack.c and cmsxform.c is preserved except for removal of the duplicate PixelSize definitions; the public API (lcms2.h) remains                           
                             unchanged.                                                                                                                                                                          
                             - Tests and fuzz harness remain intact, as no external or harness code is modified.                                                                                                 
                             - This approach mirrors common patterns in the codebase (many cmsINLINE helpers live in lcms2_internal.h) and ensures robustness across all platforms without                       
                             exposing new symbols.                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             No further file retrieval is necessary; the above strategy provides all required patch steps.                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                     
                             ===Evaluation End===

                             -DHAVE_FUNC_ATTRIBUTE_VISIBILITY=1 -DHAVE_GMTIME_R=1 -DHAVE_PTHREAD_PRIO_INHERIT=1 -DHAVE_PTHREAD=1 -DHasTHREADS=1 -I.  -I../include -I../include   -O1                             
                             -fno-omit-frame-pointer   -gline-tables-only   -Wno-error=enum-constexpr-conversion   -Wno-error=incompatible-function-pointer-types   -Wno-error=int-conversion                    
                             -Wno-error=deprecated-declarations   -Wno-error=implicit-function-declaration   -Wno-error=implicit-int   -Wno-error=vla-cxx-extension

                             cms_virtual_profile_fuzzer -runs=100.                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                                                                                             
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Summary                                                                                                                                                                          
                             A libFuzzer run of `cms_virtual_profile_fuzzer` with AddressSanitizer triggers a stack-buffer-overflow in the Little CMS library. The overflow is detected in                       
                             `UnrollChunkyBytes` (cmspack.c:130) during a call chain that originates in `cmsTransform2DeviceLink` (cmsvirt.c), where a local buffer is too small for the data                    
                             accessed.                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             A patch was attempted that centralizes a `PixelSize` helper into `lcms2_internal.h`, removes duplicate definitions in cmspack.c and cmsxform.c, and in cmsvirt.c                    
                             replaces the direct use of the loop index as input to `cmsDoTransform` with a stack-local buffer whose size is computed by `PixelSize(xform->InputFormat)`. After                   
                             applying this patch, the build fails with a compile error in cmsvirt.c: `member reference base type 'void' is not a structure or union` when writing                                
                             `xform->InputFormat`.                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Description                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Initial Issue                                                                                                                                                                       
                             - During fuzzing, AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte read beyond a stack-allocated array in `UnrollChunkyBytes` (cmspack.c:130).                                                   
                             - Callstack:                                                                                                                                                                        
                               1. UnrollChunkyBytes (cmspack.c:130)                                                                                                                                              
                               2. CachedXFORM (cmsxform.c:537)                                                                                                                                                   
                               3. cmsDoTransform (cmsxform.c:206)                                                                                                                                                
                               4. CreateNamedColorDevicelink / cmsTransform2DeviceLink (cmsvirt.c:1103)                                                                                                          
                               5. LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput (cms_virtual_profile_fuzzer.c:60)                                                                                                                       
                             - The overflow occurs at offset 36 into the stack frame of `cmsTransform2DeviceLink`, specifically past a 32-byte local variable labeled `'i.i'`.                                   
                             - ASans shadow memory shows the offending byte is just past the left redzone for that local array.                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Patch Attempt                                                                                                                                                                       
                             1. In cmspack.c and cmsxform.c, the inline `PixelSize` function was removed and a single definition was added in `lcms2_internal.h`.                                                
                             2. In cmsvirt.c at around line 1098, the code block that applied the transform directly to the loop index was replaced by:                                                          
                                - Compute `inSize = PixelSize(xform->InputFormat)`                                                                                                                               
                                - Declare `cmsUInt8Number inBuf[inSize];` as a VLA                                                                                                                               
                                - For each colorant, zero `inBuf`, copy the index `i` into it, then call `cmsDoTransform(xform, inBuf, ...)`                                                                     
                             3. After reconfiguration and rebuild, the compiler issues:                                                                                                                          
                                `cmsvirt.c:1103:49: error: member reference base type 'void' is not a structure or union`                                                                                        
                                pointing at `xform->InputFormat`, indicating that `xform` is typed as `void*` (e.g., `cmsHTRANSFORM`), not a struct pointer.                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Areas for Further Investigation                                                                                                                                                     
                             - The type of `xform` in cmsvirt.c (likely an opaque `void*`) and where its `InputFormat` field is actually stored or exposed.                                                      
                             - How `cmsHTRANSFORM` objects are defined internally, and whether a cast or accessor is provided to retrieve format information.                                                    
                             - The original stack-buffer in `cmsTransform2DeviceLink`: its declaration, size, and how much data `cmsDoTransform` writes into it.                                                 
                             - The implementation of `UnrollChunkyBytes`its assumptions about buffer sizes or input format.                                                                                     
                             - The interactions among cmspack.c, cmsxform.c, and cmsvirt.c when packing and unpacking pixel data, particularly for named color device links.                                     
                             - Inclusion paths and visibility of `PixelSize` and other internal helpers in the source tree.                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Initial Issue Log

                             ## Notes                                                                                                                                                                            
                             - All patch attempts are applied to the initial codebase. Reapply the the previous patches if needed.                                                                               
                             - If multiple different issues are present, all the issues must be resolved in a single patch attempt.                                                                              
                             - Try different approaches to resolve the issues.

                             195:                              cmsUInt32Number Size)                                                                                                                             
                             196:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             197:{                                                                                                                                                                               
                             198:    _cmsTRANSFORM* p = (_cmsTRANSFORM*) Transform;

                             200:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             201:    stride.BytesPerLineIn = 0;  // Not used
