                             42:    if (DescriptionMLU == NULL || CopyrightMLU == NULL) goto Error;                                                                                                              
                             43:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             44:    if (!cmsMLUsetWide(DescriptionMLU,  "en", "US", Description)) goto Error;                                                                                                    
                             45:    if (!cmsMLUsetWide(CopyrightMLU,    "en", "US", L"No copyright, use freely")) goto Error;                                                                                    
                             46:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             47:    if (!cmsWriteTag(hProfile, cmsSigProfileDescriptionTag,  DescriptionMLU)) goto Error;                                                                                        
                             48:    if (!cmsWriteTag(hProfile, cmsSigCopyrightTag,           CopyrightMLU)) goto Error;                                                                                          
                             49:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             50:    rc = TRUE;                                                                                                                                                                   
                             51:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             52:Error:                                                                                                                                                                           
                             53:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             54:    if (DescriptionMLU)                                                                                                                                                          
                             55:        cmsMLUfree(DescriptionMLU);                                                                                                                                              
                             56:    if (CopyrightMLU)                                                                                                                                                            
                             57:        cmsMLUfree(CopyrightMLU);                                                                                                                                                
                             58:    return rc;                                                                                                                                                                   
                             59:}                                                                                                                                                                                
                             60:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             src/cmsvirt.c:1077-1105                                                                                                                                                             
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1077:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1078:    // Critical information                                                                                                                                                    
                             1079:    cmsSetDeviceClass(hICC, cmsSigNamedColorClass);                                                                                                                            
                             1080:    cmsSetColorSpace(hICC, v ->ExitColorSpace);                                                                                                                                
                             1081:    cmsSetPCS(hICC, cmsSigLabData);                                                                                                                                            
                             1082:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1083:    // Tag profile with information                                                                                                                                            
                             1084:    if (!SetTextTags(hICC, L"Named color devicelink")) goto Error;                                                                                                             
                             1085:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1086:    Original = cmsGetNamedColorList(xform);                                                                                                                                    
                             1087:    if (Original == NULL) goto Error;                                                                                                                                          
                             1088:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1089:    nColors = cmsNamedColorCount(Original);                                                                                                                                    
                             1090:    nc2     = cmsDupNamedColorList(Original);                                                                                                                                  
                             1091:    if (nc2 == NULL) goto Error;                                                                                                                                               
                             1092:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1093:    // Colorant count now depends on the output space                                                                                                                          
                             1094:    nc2 ->ColorantCount = cmsPipelineOutputChannels(v ->Lut);                                                                                                                  
                             1095:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1096:    // Make sure we have proper formatters                                                                                                                                     
                             1097:    cmsChangeBuffersFormat(xform, TYPE_NAMED_COLOR_INDEX,                                                                                                                      
                             1098:        FLOAT_SH(0) | COLORSPACE_SH(_cmsLCMScolorSpace(v ->ExitColorSpace))                                                                                                    
                             1099:        | BYTES_SH(2) | CHANNELS_SH(cmsChannelsOfColorSpace(v ->ExitColorSpace)));                                                                                             
                             1100:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             1101:    // Apply the transfor to colorants.                                                                                                                                        
                             1102:    for (i=0; i < nColors; i++) {                                                                                                                                              
                             1103:        cmsDoTransform(xform, &i, nc2 ->List[i].DeviceColorant, 1);                                                                                                            
                             1104:    }                                                                                                                                                                          
                             1105:                                                                                                                                                                               
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             utils/transicc/Makefile.am:12-19                                                                                                                                                    
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             12:bin_PROGRAMS = transicc                                                                                                                                                          
                             13:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             14:transicc_LDADD = $(top_builddir)/src/liblcms2.la @LCMS_LIB_DEPLIBS@                                                                                                              
                             15:transicc_LDFLAGS = @LDFLAGS@                                                                                                                                                     
                             16:transicc_SOURCES = transicc.c ../common/xgetopt.c ../common/vprf.c  ../common/utils.h                                                                                            
                             17:man_MANS = transicc.1                                                                                                                                                            
                             18:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             19:EXTRA_DIST = $(man_MANS)                                                                                                                                                         
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             </code_snippets>                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Fix Strategy                                                                                                                                                                     
                             <fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1. Root Cause Analysis                                                                                                                                                              
                                - The stack-buffer-overflow arises because `cmsDoTransform` (and its helper `UnrollChunkyBytes`) reads `PixelSize(v->InputFormat)` bytes from the pointer passed                 
                             as the input buffer.  In the original code, that pointer is `&i`, a 32-bit integer, but the transforms input format in this path is `TYPE_NAMED_COLOR_INDEX`,                    
                             which is a 16-bit quantity (two bytes) *per channel*  1 channel = 2 bytes.  On some platforms or formatcombinations the effective pixel size winds up larger than                 
                             4 bytes (e.g. multichannel output side), causing reads past the 4-byte `i` slot and tripping ASan.                                                                                 
                                - The previous patch attempted to allocate a VLA `inBuf` of the right size via a call to `PixelSize()`, but `PixelSize` is a `static` function in `cmspack.c`                    
                             (not declared in any public header), so the linker fails.                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             2. Strategy to Fix                                                                                                                                                                  
                                a. In `src/cmsvirt.c`, restore a singleloop transform but replace passing `&i` directly with passing a properly sized local variable of the exact pixel size.                   
                             For namedcolor indices, that is a 16-bit quantity (`cmsUInt16Number`).                                                                                                             
                                b. Remove all references to `PixelSize()` and the temporary VLA `inBuf` attempt.                                                                                                 
                                c. Change the loop to:                                                                                                                                                           
                                   ```c                                                                                                                                                                          
                                   for (i = 0; i < nColors; i++) {                                                                                                                                               
                                       cmsUInt16Number idx = (cmsUInt16Number) i;                                                                                                                                
                                       cmsDoTransform(xform, &idx, nc2->List[i].DeviceColorant, 1);                                                                                                              
                                   }                                                                                                                                                                             
                                   ```                                                                                                                                                                           
                                d. This ensures the buffer passed to `cmsDoTransform` matches exactly the twobyte perpixel requirement, preventing any out-of-bounds read.                                     
                                e. No additional symbols are needed; no changes to the build system, harness, or external libraries.                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             3. Preservation of Functionality                                                                                                                                                    
                                - We continue to invoke the same `cmsDoTransform` path, altering only the type and size of the immediate input buffer.                                                           
                                - Namedcolor lists typically have counts  65 535, so `cmsUInt16Number` can represent any valid `i` value.  If ever `nColors` > 65 535, it would already exceed                 
                             ICC limits or require a redesign independent of this fix.                                                                                                                           
                                - Output remains written directly into `nc2->List[i].DeviceColorant`, exactly as before.                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             4. Side-Effects and Mitigations                                                                                                                                                     
                                - No new dependencies or headers are pulled in.                                                                                                                                  
                                - By removing the undefined `PixelSize` call, the build now cleanly links.                                                                                                       
                                - The fix is localized to `cmsvirt.c`, so existing tests and harness code remain untouched.                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             5. Implementation Steps                                                                                                                                                             
                                - Open `src/cmsvirt.c`.                                                                                                                                                          
                                - Locate the block around line 1101 (the loop invoking `cmsDoTransform(&i, )`).                                                                                                 
                                - Replace the entire `for (i = ) { cmsDoTransform(xform, &i, ); }` loop with the snippet above.                                                                                
                                - Rebuild and rerun the fuzzer: the AddressSanitizer error should disappear, and the linker no longer complains about `PixelSize`.                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                     
                             ===Evaluation End===
